We did see an open-box unit of this combo dip to $145 at Woot last year as part of a Logitech sale, but outside of that brief drop, this is the lowest price we’ve seen for a brand-new set, making it a great time to upgrade your Mac workstation. Folks who drive EVs with J1772 connections may sometimes find themselves surrounded by NACS connectors – whether at relatives’ homes, charging stations, and more. With the adapter you can save yourself the headache by adapting any level 1 or level 2 NACS charge gun to fit your J1772 EV – plus, it’s nice and compact for stowing away in your glovebox, so you’ll always have it at the ready.
